Canada, Northwest Territories"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"4"}},{"691":{"subfields":[{"a":"PNW, Canada, Yukon"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"4"}},{"086":{"subfields":[{"a":"Fs97-6/3685E-PDF"}],"ind1":"1","ind2":" "}},{"020":{"subfields":[{"a":"9780660767512"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"024":{"subfields":[{"a":"https://doi.org/10.60825/dmzw-we44"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"504":{"subfields":[{"a":"Includes bibliographical references."}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"520":{"subfields":[{"a":"Dramatic changes in sea ice have been well-documented across the Arctic, yet our understanding of sea ice decline at smaller scales remains limited. This is particularly relevant in areas of cultural and ecological significance to coastal Indigenous communities, such as Marine Protected Areas (MPAs), which require site-specific data to prepare for and mitigate change. A small-scale application was used to assess sea ice change from weekly sea ice charts generated from the Tarium Niryutait Marine Protected Area (TNMPA) between 1980 and 2022. Over this 43-year period, sea ice coverage decreased and open water increased by 17 days when comparing the median number of open water days by decade, indicating that the TNMPA is now experiencing earlier break-ups and later freeze-ups. The rate of change also varied across the three areas of the MPA, with the Kittigaryuit area experiencing more open water days (19) than the Okeevik (16 days) or Niaqunnaq (13 days) areas. This high rate of change highlights the need to better understand the impacts of sea ice decline in ecologically and culturally important areas and enhance community-scale approaches to monitoring environmental change."}],"ind1":"3","ind2":" "}},{"520":{"subfields":[{"a":"Des changements spectaculaires dans la glace de mer ont été bien documentés dans tout l’Arctique, mais notre compréhension du déclin de la glace de mer à plus petite échelle reste limitée. Une application à petite échelle a été utilisée pour évaluer le changement dans la glace de mer à partir des cartes hebdomadaires générées pour la ZPM de Tarium Niryutait entre 1980 et 2022. Une comparaison du nombre médian de jours d’eaux libres par décennie au cours de cette période de 43 ans a révélé que la période de couverture de glace de mer a diminué de 17 jours (la période d’eaux libres ayant donc augmenté de 17 jours), ce qui signifie que la débâcle est maintenant plus précoce et le gel plus tardif dans la ZPM de Tarium Niryutait. Le taux de changement a également varié dans les trois zones de la ZPM, la zone de Kittigaryuit ayant connu plus de jours d’eaux libres (19) que les zones d’Okeevik (16 jours) ou de Niaqunnaq (13 jours). Ce taux de changement élevé souligne la nécessité de mieux comprendre les répercussions du déclin de la glace de mer dans les zones importantes sur le plan écologique et culturel et d’améliorer les approches à l’échelle communautaire pour assurer un suivi des changements environnementaux."}],"ind1":"3","ind2":"9"}},{"524":{"subfields":[{"a":"Gully, K., McNicholl, D., Iacozza, J., and Dunmall, K. 2025. Sea ice change in the Tarium Niryutait Marine Protected Area 1980-2022. Can. Tech. Rep. Fish. Aquat. Sci. 3685: vi + 17 p. https://doi.org/10.60825/dmzw-we44"}],"ind1":"8","ind2":" "}},{"264":{"subfields":[{"a":"Winnipeg, Man. :"},{"b":"Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Freshwater Institute, Arctic Region,"},{"c":"2025."}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"1"}},{"264":{"subfields":[{"c":"©2025"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"4"}},{"300":{"subfields":[{"a":"1 online resource (vi, 17 pages) :"},{"b":"tables, map, charts"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"336":{"subfields":[{"a":"text"},{"b":"txt"},{"2":"rdacontent"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"337":{"subfields":[{"a":"computer"},{"b":"c"},{"2":"rdamedia"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"338":{"subfields":[{"a":"online resource"},{"b":"cr"},{"2":"rdacarrier"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"490":{"subfields":[{"a":"Canadian technical report of fisheries and aquatic sciences,"},{"x":"1488-5379 ;"},{"v":"3685"}],"ind1":"1","ind2":" "}},{"830":{"subfields":[{"a":"Canadian technical report of fisheries and aquatic sciences ;"},{"v":"3685."},{"x":"1488-5379"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"0"}},{"245":{"subfields":[{"a":"Sea ice change in the Tarium Niryutait Marine Protected Area 1980-2022 /"},{"c":"by Kevin Gully, Darcy McNicholl, John Iacozza, Karen Dunmall."}],"ind1":"1","ind2":"0"}},{"006":"m     o  d f      "},{"007":"cr cn ---aunu "},{"008":"250423t20252025mbcabd  o    f000 0 eng dnam i "},{"040":{"subfields":[{"a":"CaBVIEM"},{"b":"eng"},{"e":"rda"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"041":{"subfields":[{"a":"eng"},{"b":"eng"},{"b":"fre"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"995":{"subfields":[{"a":"DFO"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}}]}}
